Miles Sound System SDK 6.6h

AIL_3D_velocity

The function AIL_3D_velocity retrieves the current velocity of a 3D sample, the listener, or a 3D object.

void AIL_3D_velocity(
  H3DPOBJECT obj,
  F32 *dX_per_ms,
  F32 *dY_per_ms,
  F32 *dZ_per_ms
);

In Parameters

obj
indicates the 3D sample, the listener, or the 3D object to query.

Out Parameters

dX_per_ms
returns the current non-normalized delta value in meters per millisecond in the X dimension.
dY_per_ms
returns the current non-normalized delta value in meters per millisecond in the Y dimension.
dZ_per_ms
returns the current non-normalized delta value in meters per millisecond in the Z dimension.

Discussion

This function always returns non-normalized vectors.

You can pass NULL for any value that you're not interested in.


Group: 3D Digital Audio Services
Related Functions: AIL_set_3D_velocity, AIL_set_3D_velocity_vector
Related Basic Types: F32, H3DPOBJECT, void
